ComicInfo.Series: The Legend of Oz: Wicked West
ComicInfo.Summary:
Take a trip back over the rainbow to an Oz you never knew existed! slips on her ruby spurs after falling out of the sky and is sent off to follow the Yellow Brick Road to the Emerald City. The only problem is the road is gone! Oz itself has been transformed into a wild west landscape: Flying monkeys and scarecrows still walk the plains of Oz, but in ways you would never have imagined! Featuring re-mastered content, an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at the making of Legend of Oz, a special foreword by L. Frank Baum's great-great grandson, Marc Baum, creator commentary and more! Don't miss out on the start of Aspen's newest BDI launch with the premiere of LEGEND OF OZ: THE WICKED WEST #1!
